Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is not just any product; it's a game-changer that can significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-value asset at a premium rate, tailored specifically for individuals like yourself who appreciate excellence. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
